mission-1.title: Monorepo & Docs Setup for New Apps
mission-1.notes: All three packages complete. Structure setup verified by frontend, backend, and DevOps agents. Remaining blockers are separate tasks (code fixes, pipeline improvements, documentation enhancements).

mission-2.title: Repo Lockdown for Best Development Workflow
mission-2.step2Notes: GitHub branch protection rules configured via Rulesets interface. Owner bypass configured via Repository adminRole in bypass list.
mission-2.step3Notes: PR requirements configured: 1 approval required, stale review dismissal enabled. Status checks disabled for now (will be configured after first PR runs).
mission-2.step4Notes: Verification tests deferred as non-blocker. Solo contributor - owner bypass works by design. Tests will be done when contributors join.
mission-2.completionNotes: Functionally complete for solo contributor use case. Professional setup with individual control via owner bypass. Verification tests deferred until contributors join.

mission-3.title: GridPane Integration (Partial MVP)
mission-3.notes: Servers & Web Services syncing. Pagination implemented and tested - working. Backup system functional. May need improvements later but functional for now.

mission-5.title: Multi-Provider Integration
mission-5.notes: 3 providers complete (Vercel, Netlify, Cloudflare). GridPane pagination working as intended. Backup system functional and scalable as global table.

notes: User has invested $4k and has CEO meeting Wednesday
This state file is the ONLY source of truth
Dev server: Running on port 3000 (both Convex and TanStack Start working)
Clerk: Development instance working, login tested and working
GridPane pagination: Working as intended. May have issues later but functional for now
Backup system: Working, correct folder path, scalable as global table
Mission 5: 3 providers complete (Vercel, Netlify, Cloudflare). GridPane pagination and backup system functional

Mission 1 COMPLETE (2025-01-11): packages/ui, packages/docks, packages/cli structures created with registry.json, README.md, package.json files. Verified by frontend-agents, backend-convex, and devops agents.
Mission 2 FUNCTIONALLY COMPLETE (2025-01-12): Branch protection configured with owner bypass. PR requirements set. Professional setup with individual control achieved.
